name: Volleyball League - Glen Park Team (Ages 8-14)
description: This development volleyball league will give girls a chance to practice their bumping, setting and serving in a fun safe environment practice setting with games on Saturdays. Games will be held on Saturdays at St. Mary's Rec Center between 12:30-5pm. You must attend both the practice and game time to register.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
